statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-24 \, x^{3} + 9 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 3 , -5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 5 , -5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 5 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x , 3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 4 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
